pages.text: $(li)The Sunbird is a passive creature that flies around the Overworld.$(br)$(li)If a Sunbird is near of a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/beacon)Beacon$(/l) beam, it will begin circling around it. This can be a way to keep Sunbirds within an area.$(br)$(li)When a Sunbird fly over undead creatures, they will burn up.
Sunbirds are completely resistant to fire damage.

$(li)If you manage to get close to a Sunbird, you will obtain the Sunbird's Blessing effect for 30 seconds, making you fall slowly.$(br)$(li)If you have an $(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)Elytra$(/l) on whilst having this effect, it makes it easier to fly and reduces kinetic damage.$(br)$(li)When the Sunbird grants this effect, it emits a bright flash.

$(li)If you hits a Sunbird, the blessing is revoked and instead you will receive the Sunbird's Curse effect for 30 seconds.$(br)$(li)This effect makes you fall to the ground and greatly reduces jumping.
